Classes in com.wizarpos.devices used by com.wizarpos.devices
DeviceException
          An DeviceException is thrown when access problems are detected by the service controls.
DeviceManager
          DeviceManager 是获得每个设备接口的入口。获取该对象不能使用new方法，可以通过getInstance方法获得。
DeviceManagerProvider
          DeviceManagerProvider is the interface for the implementation of the device manager provider.
OperationResult
          Operation results are generated by a device implementation to notify the application of the completion of a requested operation.
 

Classes in com.wizarpos.devices used by com.wizarpos.devices.contactlesscard
DeviceControl
          DeviceControl接口是所有设备Control的根类。所有的设备Control的接口 和实现类都必须继承至这个接口。 这个类定义了设备的close方法和cancel执行中的异步操作的方法。
DeviceException
          An DeviceException is thrown when access problems are detected by the service controls.
OperationListener
           
OperationResult
          Operation results are generated by a device implementation to notify the application of the completion of a requested operation.
TimeConstants
          This interface contains a number of useful constants for use with methods that accept a timeout as a parameter.
